meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Renew</kanji> and make something <kanji>correct</kanji>. When you do this, you are doing a <vocabulary>revision</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>amendment</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>alteration</vocabulary>. Ah, much better now.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
